thread.title: Amber Rose opens up about her kiss with ex Wiz Khalifa | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Amber Rose opens up about her kiss with ex Wiz Khalifa | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Amber Rose opens up about her kiss with ex Wiz Khalifa | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share 'Wiz and I are family and we will be family for the rest of our lives for Sebastian.' She continued, 'We've been through hell and back so a kiss on the lips for a photo and a night out of fun is not a big deal for either of us, we are in a great place but we are still very much divorced and not together.' 'Wiz and I are family' The starlet was quick to tell followers any affection between her and Wiz is simply platonic and that she and her ex 'we will be family for the rest of our lives' because of their son Sebastian. Here is a picture of the whole family back in late 2015 She then went on to talk about previous flame Val Chmerkovskiy, whom the star split from on Friday. The former exotic dancer explained that things ended on good terms and that the pair still care deeply for one another. 'The awesome person that I got to spend the past 5 months with (Val) and I broke up due to out own personal reason but we still care about each other tremendously and we love each other's families even more.' That awesome guy: Amber also explained that the split between her and Val was completely mutual and called the dancer 'the awesome guy I got to spend the past 5 months with'. Here you can see the pair enjoying a Knicks game together back in January She finished the note with a simple reminder to both fans and trolls: everyone, even stars, have feelings. 'So please understand that we are all human and we have feelings too. Nobody got dumped and nothing we do over here is malicious its just how life works sometimes.' Amber's dancer ex Val also addressed the rumors in his own Instagram post, where he called the starlet 'an amazing woman' who he feels 'very lucky to have gotten to know and love.' His two cents: Dancer Val Chmerkovskiy shared some of his feelings in another Instagram note where he called the Loveline hostess 'reserved, poised and loyal' and explained that their split was totally mutual He continued to lavish her with words, saying that Amber is 'an amazing mother, an awesome friend, a loving human period. Reserved, poised, and loyal.' The Dancing With The Stars pro made his feelings crystal clear, ending the note by saying 'to stress that to the more common folk "she loyal af."' Amber and Val met during the 23rd season of Dancing With The Stars where the Loveline hostess competed with Val's brother Maksim Maks Chmerkovskiy. The pair finished in 9th place.
